basics.name: Yilin Jing
basics.headline: MSc Applied Computational Science & Engineering Student | AI Research Platform Developer | Serial Entrepreneur
basics.location: Imperial College London, Department of Earth Science & Engineering

items.name: Technologies
items.description: Docker, Nix, Git, Cloud Computing (AWS/GCP), LLMs, API Integration

items.name: Research Skills
items.description: Experimental Design, Data Analysis, Scientific Writing, Reproducible Research Practices

summary.name: Summary
summary.content: MSc student in Applied Computational Science & Engineering at Imperial College London with a focus on developing innovative AI solutions for scientific research. Currently developing an AI-powered automated research platform that addresses reproducibility challenges in computational science through containerization and AI assistance. Seeking to combine entrepreneurial vision with technical expertise to revolutionize how interdisciplinary research is conducted.

items.name: E2M (Everything to Markdown)
items.description: Created an open-source Python library that converts various file types (doc, docx, epub, html, pdf, ppt, pptx, mp3, m4a) into Markdown format. The project has gained over 1,000 stars on GitHub and is widely used for preparing data for Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and model training.
highlights: Designed a modular parser-converter architecture for handling multiple file formats
Implemented Docker containerization for easy deployment
Built a RESTful API service for integration with other applications
Created comprehensive documentation and examples for users
items.summary: An open-source Python library for converting various file types to Markdown format with over 1,000 GitHub stars.

items.name: AI-Powered Presentation Generation Platform
items.description: Developed an innovative platform that leverages AI to automatically generate and customize PowerPoint presentations. The system utilizes LLMs and AI agents for content generation and styling, while implementing advanced CSS and frontend technologies for precise visual customization.
highlights: Architected an AI agent system that coordinates content generation, layout design, and style customization
Implemented LLM-driven CSS style generation for creating personalized presentation themes
Developed a dynamic frontend interface for real-time presentation preview and editing
Created an automated style recommendation system based on user preferences and presentation context
items.summary: An AI-powered platform that automates PowerPoint presentation creation with personalized styling and content generation capabilities.
Relevant Coursework: Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Data Science, Computational Mathematics
Relevant Coursework: Advanced Mathematics, Signal Processing, Machine Learning, Data Structures
Led a cross-functional team of 6 developers in developing an AI-powered PPT generation platform, focusing on personalized presentation creation through AI-generated styles.
highlights: Managed and coordinated a team of 6 frontend and backend developers to deliver an AI-powered presentation generation system
Architected and implemented AI-driven CSS style generation for personalized presentation themes
Led the development of user-centric PPT generation features that adapt to individual preferences and needs
Streamlined the development process and ensured efficient collaboration between frontend and backend teams

items.summary: Founded Wisup AI, leading its development with registered entities in the UK and China. Specializes in data processing tools and AI-driven research automation. Created the E2M library, achieving over 1,000 GitHub stars.
highlights: Established a business presence in the UK and China
Developed the E2M library for file-to-Markdown conversion
Engineered a modular architecture for diverse parsers and converters
Implemented Docker-based solutions for streamlined installation
Authored detailed documentation and user examples

items.summary: Led development of AI-powered data processing and visualization solutions.
highlights: Webpage to Dataset: Developed a Python API that automatically converts webpages into structured datasets using LLMs (e.g., GPT-3.5). Solved key challenges in dataset traceability and missing value imputation through AI agent-based self-reflection and self-generation, enhancing my ability to combine AI with data processing.

Dataset Auto Visualization: Created a full-stack web application using Python, DuckDB, and Streamlit, allowing users to interact with, query, and visualize data using natural language. Proposed an AI-powered data field optimizer that categorizes, ranks, and verifies field values to enable efficient text-to-SQL conversion for datasets with over 1,000 fields.

items.summary: Developed data processing and analysis solutions for research papers.
highlights: Arxiv to Dataset: Developed a system leveraging NLP techniques (e.g., Named Entity Recognition and information extraction models) and large language models (e.g., GPT-3.5, LLaMA2) to extract relevant papers from the arXiv database based on user intent. The system also processed data to build datasets that provided users with insights in specific domains. Achieved a data recall rate of 98% and dataset accuracy of 92%.
Full Stack App: Built both the frontend and backend of the project using Python, Langchain and NextJS, successfully delivering a product prototype.

items.name: Nanolayered graphene-based tunable terahertz metasurfaces as polarization converters and beam deflectors
items.publisher: IEEE Conference on Telecommunications, Optics and Computer Science (TOCS)
items.authors: M. Xie, Y. Jing, Y. Zheng
items.summary: Research on tunable terahertz metasurfaces using graphene for polarization conversion and beam deflection applications. DOI: 10.1109/TOCS56154.2022.10016121

items.name: Method and System for Constructing a Data Structure Based on a Blockchain
items.summary: Developed an innovative data structure construction method leveraging blockchain technology to ensure data integrity and traceability, enhancing security and transparency in digital transactions.

items.name: Intelligent Data Processing Method Based on Blockchain and Artificial Intelligence
items.summary: Invented a novel intelligent data processing approach combining blockchain and AI to automate and optimize data handling processes, enhancing efficiency and accuracy in data management.
